mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Trust of John Stuart
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Trust of John Stuart J. L. Lawrence, Trustee, Administrator of John Stuart's estate S. M. B. Stuart, Trustee, Administrator of John Stuart's Estate Ellen Stuart, Widow, Beneficiary of Trust Heirs and Beneficiaries of Trust: N. B. Ranes & wife, J. T. Stuart, James G. Stuart, C. W. Stuart, S.M.B. Stuart, E.J. Lesueur & wife, J.J, Taylor & wife, J.E. Hartwell & wife, J.E. Lawrence & wife Recorded in Ledger Book 4, Page 281, in the Floyd County Courthouse.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Court Records
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
